New AI2D data resource: Shared brain imaging data available on CUBIC

Posted by Tien Tong on November 18, 2025

We are delighted to announce the release of the AI2D shared brain imaging data resource – now openly available to all on CUBIC. The initial release includes 10 studies with over 9,000 sessions. This includes BIDS-curated raw data as well as fully processed sMRI, fMRI, and dMRI data.

Check it out here: https://pennlinc.github.io/AI2D

Click on each dataset for details; instructions for how to access the data (without duplication!) can be found on the Get Data page.

⭐Coming soon⭐:

  1. More datasets❗❗❗: OASIS, GSP and more
  2. More pipelines❗❗❗: DLMUSE outputs arriving soon
  3. More modalities❗❗❗: ASL data as available

Please don’t hesitate to reach out to Tien Tong if you have any questions about the data, access, or anything else.

The AI2D Neuroimaging Data Team
